description: You want to take this class?

I'm aware that if the feedback report is not submitted in 6 hrs after a class, Ringle compensates 90% of the contracted price. If the feedback report is not submitted in 24hrs after a class, Ringle compensates 83.5% of the contracted price.
I'm aware that the compensation will be processed when the feedback report is submitted.
I agree to remain in the classroom for the full 40 minutes, even if a student does not join. If the class is delayed by my end issue, I will compensate for the lost time.

I'm aware that I may be asked to perform a short activity (ex. Correcting 2-3 English sentences) whiling waiting in a classroom. But when the student joins, I am not responsible for completing the task.
I agree to share my voice data with the student to help him/her improve English. The voice would be only used to maintain the quality and promote educational purpose.
I am aware that Ringle doesn't record any type of video.
If a class has a technical issue due to a student's or tutor's issue, and class time was within 15 minutes, I agree to receive 50% of original contracted price.
If the quality of a class was severely affected by bad internet environment, sound noise, and etc, I agree to receive less than 50% of original contracted price.
[Warning] If you cancel a class that will begin in an hour before a session, no matter what your situation is, you consent to pay $10 to Ringle.
